The start-up loan program envisages provisions of business start-up and re-startup credits with soft conditions to the country’s rural poor, which do not have access to credit products, being regarded as “high risk borrowers” because of low income. With the received credit Ramin will purchase chickens to start a poultry farm. He will place the chickens in a shed located in their yard. He will raise them and sell them for a higher price. The new business initiative, financed with the Kiva start-up loan will significantly improve the living conditions of the family.

loans.use: to start a poultry farm.

loans.name: Daysi Aracely

texts.es: Daysi Aracely vive junto a su compañero de vida y su hijo en casa propia, ella se dedica a la elaboración y venta de hamacas, de muchos diseños que ella misma crea, tiene varios años con el negocio y eso le ha regalado mucha experiencia en la venta que le permite obtener las mejores ganancias, su negocio esta ubicado en su vivienda y es muy conocido por las personas de la comunidad donde viven,  tiene mucha clientela y la prefieren por la calidad, los buenos  precios y sobre todo por  un buen servicio; Daysi es una mujer emprendedora, dedicada a  su labor y con muchas ganas de salir adelante y cumplir sus sueños ,  todos los días trabaja duro para poder alcanzar el éxito y no piensa rendirse hasta lograrlo, quiere acrecentar el negocio y para ello necesita de capital que la respalde por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar hilos por mayor, cuerda, etc. Daysi Aracely tiene buenas referencias de pago y una moral intachable, asegura que podrá saldar la deuda y  la vez confía que le dará a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Daysi Aracely lives together with her life partner and their son in their own home. She makes and sells hammocks of all different designs that she creates herself. She has run this business for several years, accumulating a lot of experience in sales that allows her to make the best earnings possible. Her business is located in her home and is well known by the people of the community where she lives. She has a lot of customers who prefer her because of the high quality and good prices of the hammocks, but above all, because of Daysi's good service. 

Daysi is a very entrepreneurial woman dedicated to her work. She has a strong drive to get ahead and achieve her dreams. She works hard every day to be able to achieve success and does not consider giving up until she achieves her goals. 

Daysi wants to expand her business. In order to do so, she needs working capital to back her up, which is why she is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL. The loan would allow her to purchase wholesale thread, cord, etc. Daysi Aracely has a good credit record and irreproachable morals. She guarantees that she will be able to pay off the debt and at the same time, is confident that she will be able to give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: invest in wholesale thread and cord

loans.name: Julio Cesar

texts.es: Julio Cesar vive junto a su compañera de vida Rosa y sus dos hijas en casa propia; el posee un taller de carpintería elabora mesas, sillas, bancos, entre otros tiene varios años con el negocio y eso le ha regalado experiencia valiosa en su trabajo y le ha traído muy buenas ganancias, el negocio esta ubicado en su vivienda en una localidad muy transitada de personas, es muy conocido por su excelente labor y se ha hecho de mucha clientela fija que lo prefiere porque siempre tiene lo que necesita a precios realmente accesibles,  además de la calidad y el buen servicio; Julio es un hombre ejemplar, decidido y dedicado a su labor le gusta luchar por lo que desea y quiere un futuro mejor por eso se esfuerza al máximo para alcanzar el éxito que se merece, en las ultimas semanas aumento la demanda y no posee de materia prima, necesita realizar una nueva inversión para no decepcionar a sus clientes por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar madera, pegamento, clavos, etc. Julio Cesar tiene buenas referencias de pago y una moral intachable, asegura que cancela en el periodo establecido y a la vez tiene la esperanza que llevara a su hogar seguridad económica.
texts.en:
Julio Cesar lives with his life partner Rosa and their two daughters in their own home. He has a carpentry workshop where he makes tables, chairs, benches, and more. He has worked in this business for several years. He has gained valuable work experiences and has brought in a good profit. The business is located in his home in an area busy with a lot of people. He is known for his excellent work and has accumulated many regular customers. They always prefer him not only because he always has what they need at accessible prices, but also because of the good quality and service. 

Julio is an exemplary man, resolute and dedicated to his work. He likes fighting for what he wants and aspires to a better future. Thus, he works as hard as he can to achieve the success that he deserves. 

In the past few weeks, demand has gone up, but he does not have the raw materials. He needs to make a new investment so as not to disappoint his customers. He is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL that would allow him to purchase wood, glue, nails, etc. 

Julio Cesar has a good credit record and irreproachable morals. He guarantees that he will pay off the loan in the established time period, and at the same time, he hopes that he will bring economic security to his home.

loans.use: purchase wood, glue, and nails

loans.name: Maanga Group

texts.fr:
Mme HABIBOU est la représentante du groupe MAANGA. Habibou se porte très bien. Elle est mariée et mère de 04 enfants. Le plus âgé a 18ans le moins âgé a 07ans. Maintenant, tous ses enfants  vont à l’école et elle a 04 personnes à sa charge.
Mme vend des pagnes  et plats  depuis 07ans. Elle s’approvisionne  au marché du secteur 10 en ville. Ses clients sont les amis et les voisins.
Mme veut  s’acheter  20 complets pagnes  et 30 complets de plats.
Elle  épargne ses bénéfices afin  d’aider à la scolarisation des enfants. Mme ambitionne ouvrir une grande boutique pour son activité et participer à la construction d’une maison d’habitation.
texts.en:
Habibou is the representative of the Maanga group and is very well. She is married and mother to four children, the eldest of whom is 18 years old and the youngest seven. All her children go to school now and she has four dependents. 

She has been selling "pagnes" and flatware for the past seven years. She gets her supplies from the Sector 10 market in town and her customers are friends and neighbors. She would like to buy 20 sets of pagnes and 30 sets of flatware. 

She saves her profits so that she can help with the children's education. Her ambition is to open a large shop for her business and contribute to the construction of a house.

loans.use: to buy 20 sets of "pagnes" and 30 sets of flatware.

loans.name: L'aenir Group

texts.fr:
Mme AISSATOU représente le groupe L’AENIR. Elle se porte bien. Mariée, elle est mère de 03 enfants. Le plus âgé a 13ans et le moins âgé a 06ans. Tous vont à l’école et elle a une (01) personne en charge.
 Mme vend des produits de beauté, des objets plastiques et fait aussi la coiffure depuis 11ans. Elle s’approvisionne dans les marchés locaux. Ses clients sont les femmes, hommes et son entourage.
 Elle veut s’acheter 05 douzaines de tissage, 45 seaux, 25 bassine et 05 carton de pommades toutes sortes. 
Elle veut épargner ses bénéfices. Mme ambitionne toujours améliorer son activité, aider son mari à assurer la scolarité de ses enfants et s’acheter une parcelle.
texts.en:
Aissatou represents the Aenir group and is doing very well. She is married and mother to three children, the eldest of whom is 13 years old and the youngest six. All of the children go to school and she has one dependent. 

She has been selling beauty products, plastic objects and also been hairdressing for the past eleven years. She gets her supplies in a local market. Her customers are women, men and her circle of friends.

She would like to buy five dozen hair weaves, 45 buckets, 25 bowls and five cartons of all sorts of creams. 

She wants to save her profits and her ambition is to continue to improve her business, help her husband to provide for her children's education and to buy a plot of land.

loans.use: to buy five dozen hair weaves, 45 buckets, 25 bowls and five cartons of all sorts of creams.

loans.name: Cornel

texts.en:
Cornel is 43 years old, married and has three children. She operates a beauty salon. She has been in business for the past ten years. She used her previous loan to add a student classroom. Her business did well and she successfully repaid her loan. She is very hardworking and determined. Since she joined Faulu Kenya, her business has grown tremendously and she has bought salon equipment.

She hopes to grow her profit margins and educate her children up to the university level. She requires a loan of 30,213 KES to pay school fees.

loans.use: to pay school fees

loans.name: Chigunda's Group

texts.en:
Chigunda is a thirty-six-year old mother of five children and a dry-land farmer. She grows maize, cowpeas and cassava. Chigunda's agricultural business faces the challenges of unreliable rainfall and lack of capital to buy pesticides.

She is joining the KOMAZA microforestry program because she believes KOMAZA is helping to empower farmers with knowledge and skills. With the profits from her tree farm, Chigunda plans to educate her children and open a warehousing business.

loans.use: to pay for eucalyptus seedlings, fertilizer, training and plantation maintenance support

loans.name: Ramin

texts.en:
Ramin is 26 years old. He is unmarried and lives in Batumi city with his parents. Ramin’s mother is a teacher at the public school and his father is involved in a meat-trading business.

The main income for Ramin is his newly-started grocery store, selling different types of groceries. As he has recently opened it, the store needs more support to further develop. Ramin’s loan request was approved as part of the new joint initiative of Kiva and Credo. The start-up loan program provides business start-ups and re-startups with credit with soft conditions to the rural poor who do not have access to credit products since they are regarded as “high-risk borrowers” because of their low income.

With the received credit, Ramin will cover the costs of purchasing needed stock of basic groceries that customers often request. He plans to increase the turnover in his trade business gradually. The new business initiative, financed with the Kiva start-up loan, will significantly increase the income of the family. Ramin will work hard, and he will be able to improve the living conditions for his family. With this loan, his family will generate enough income to access regular available credit products in the country’s capital market in the event that they need it.

loans.use: to purchase stocks of groceries for his newly-started store

loans.name: Furaha's Group

texts.en:
Furaha is a thirty-four-year old mother of seven and a dry land farmer. She grows maize, cowpeas and cassava. Furaha does not have enough money to buy seeds to plant and insecticides when the crops are affected by pests, resulting in low yields.

She is joining the KOMAZA microforestry program because she knows that in the future she will make profits from the sale of trees. "The profits I will make will enable me to send my kids to a good school to get an education," she says.

loans.use: to pay for eucalyptus seedlings, fertilizer, training and plantation maintenance support

loans.name: Fred

texts.en:
Fred is an old client with this institution; he is in his second cycle. He applied for a loan of one million shillings specifically to buy pesticides to spray pests that destroy his passion fruits. These pests have reduced his output, hence reduced sales, and this has made his life a little bit uneasy.  

Fred is a married man with one child and has been doing this business of passion fruit growing and selling for the last four years. He works six days a week and his main customers are traders from Kampala and Masaka, local residents and nearby markets. Fred has plans to expand his business by buying more land, but his challenges currently are pests and diseases - which will be solved by this loan. Other challenges are unreliable weather, price fluctuations, poor storage facilities and lack of enough land for expansion. 

With continued support from this institution, it is certain that Alex, with his positive attitude and spirit of hard work, will fulfill his dream of having a very big passion fruit farm.

loans.use: To buy pesticides.

loans.name: Norayr

texts.en: Norayr is from Artsvanik village in the Syunik region. He lives with his wife, son and two daughters. Norayr's elder daughter, Flora, studies at "Yerevan State Medical University after Mkhitar Heratsi" (a 12th century Armenian physician) in the department of general medicine. The whole family works hard to save money and pay for Flora's university tuition. Norayr has applied for this loan to pay for his daughter’s tuition. The loan is very important for Norayr to give Flora the opportunity to complete her education.

loans.use: to pay for university tuition.

loans.name: Anahit

texts.en:
Anahit lives in Artsvanik village in the Syunik region. She is a mother of three children, two of whom are students. Together with her husband Anahit works hard to sustain her family and save money for her children's education. Anahit's son, Seryoja, studies at "Armenian State Pedagogical University after Khachatur Abovyan", in the department of history. 

It is very difficult for Anahit to save money for Seryoja’s education, so she has applied for this loan. With the help of the loan Anahit will pay for university tuition and Seryoja will be able to complete his education.

Ananhit's husband, Norayr, applied to us for another loan to pay for their daughter's university tuition. It is very important to Anahit and her husband to give their children the opportunity to get a higher education and become good specialists.

loans.use: to pay for university tuition.

loans.name: Nare

texts.en:
Nare is from Artashat town; she lives with her parents and brother. She owns a little shop where she sells clothing.  

Nare studies at Yerevan Haybusak University, in the medical department. She works hard to sustain her family, as well as cover her education costs. Unfortunately, her monthly income is hardly enough to cover daily costs, and it is very difficult for Nare to save money for tuition. 

She has applied for this loan to pay for her university tuition and complete her education.

She dreams of becoming a good specialist and helping people.

loans.use: to pay for university tuition.

loans.name: Ashot

texts.en:
Ashot lives in Vanadzor town with his wife and son Davit (in the photo), who is a student. Davit studies at "Yerevan State Medical University after Mkhitar Heratsi", in the department of general medicine. 

Ashot works as a coordinator at one of the local companies, but his monthly salary is hardly enough for covering the family's daily costs. It is very difficult for him to save money for his son's education, so he has applied for this loan to pay Davit's university tuition.

The loan is very important for Ashot to give his son an opportunity to complete his education and become a good specialist.

loans.use: to pay for university tuition.

loans.name: Marie

texts.en:
Marie is one of Esperanza International's entrepreneurs. She came to Esperanza International almost seven years ago for a loan to expand her grocery store. She joined the group "Dios es mi Pastor - God is my Shepherd" in one of the rural villages in San Pedro de Macoris, where she has received loans to invest in her business. 

Marie is a mother with three children that she is raising by herself and with her long term partner. She lives in a small slum community in San Pedro de Macoris. She is receiving her 10th loan from Esperanza. She is accessing this loan to start building her home. She has been building her house little by little, and the purpose of this loan is especially to build and raise some walls, because previously she had only built the foundations of the house. 

Marie will invest this loan by purchasing cement, concrete blocks, sand and other construction materials. Esperanza Internacional is running a program where most of their clients pay back their loans, fulfill their commitment to expand their businesses, and show fidelity to their groups. They can request loans to improve their house structure while receiving business loans and attending group meetings.

loans.use: To purchase concrete blocks, cement, etc.

loans.name: Rosa Alba De La Cruz

texts.es: Rosa Alba vive junto a su compañero de vida José y su  hija, ella se dedica a la compra y venta de semillas, de marañón, pepitoria y maní, tiene varios años con el negocio y eso le ha regalado mucha experiencia que le permite obtener las mejores ganancias, el lugar donde comercia es muy concurrido de personas lo realiza de forma ambulante y desde su hogar, ya tiene mucha clientela que la prefiere porque su producto es delicioso, a buen precio, de calidad y  con un excelente servicio; Rosa es una mujer comprometida, joven y dedicada a su labor con muchas ganas de salir adelante, siempre esta buscando alternativas que le permitan alcanzar el éxito, en las ultimas semanas aumento la demanda y quiere aprovechar para realizar una nueva inversión pero no posee de suficiente capital que la respalde ya que sus compras son al contado por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar semilla de marañón que ha estado un poco escasa, pepitoria y maní. Rosa Alba tiene buenas referencias de pago es responsable y esta agradecida con la colaboración, asegura que podrá saldar la deuda y a la vez confía que le dará a su familia una vida mejor.
texts.en:
Rosa Alba lives with her life partner José and her daughter.  She makes a living buying and selling cashew, pumpkin, and peanut seeds.

She has had the business for several years, which has given her a lot of experience so she can get the best profits.  The place where she sells is crowded with people.  She does her job as a street vendor and from home because she has a lot of customers who prefer her for her delicious and quality product, good price, and excellent service.

Rosa's a committed young woman who is dedicated to her job and very much wants to get ahead.  She's always looking for ways to achieve success.  Demand has increased in the past few weeks and she wants to take advantage of it to make a new investment, but she doesn't have enough capital to support this because her sales are in cash.

This is why she's asking Integral for a loan to buy cashew seeds, which have been a little scarce, pumpkin seeds, and peanuts.

Rosa Alba has a good payment record and is responsible.  She's grateful for the contribution and is certain she'll be able to repay the debt.  She's also confident that she'll give her family a better life.

loans.use: to buy cashew, peanut, and pumpkin seeds

loans.name: Narek

texts.en:
Narek is from Ijevan town, where he lives with his wife and two children. He is 28 years old and works at a local company. His wife, Narine, studies at Yerevan State University, with the pedagogical (education) faculty. 

Narek is a lovely father and husband who works hard to sustain his family and pay for his wife's education.  As his monthly income is hardly enough to cover the family's daily costs, it is very difficult for Narek to save money for Narine's education.

Narek has applied for this loan to pay for his wife's university tuition. The loan is very important for Narek and his wife in order for her to complete her education and become a good specialist.

loans.use: to pay for university tuition for his wife.

loans.name: Hasmik

texts.en:
Hasmik is a student at Yerevan State Medical University, which is named after Mkhitar Heratsi, the father of Armenian medicine. She lives with her mother and brother, who is 18.

Along with school, Hasmik also works at a local pharmacy. Her monthly income is hardly enough to cover the family's daily costs, because Hasmik is the only worker in the family. 

That's why it is very difficult for Hasmik to save money for her education. She has applied for this loan to pay for her university tuition. 

It is very important for Hasmik to complete her education, and be able to ensure a better life for her mother and her brother.

loans.use: to pay for university tuition.

loans.name: Anita

texts.en:
Anita is 47 years old and married with four children.

She earns a living by raising pigs in the Philippines, which she has done for the last six years.  Anita is borrowing PHP 16,000 through NWTF to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to repair and renovate her family home.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Melva

texts.en:
Melva works hard to support her family. Melva is married and has a general store business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for 13 years now.

Melva requested a loan of 21000 PHP through NWTF to buy stocks of items like soap, candies, sugar, and milk to sell.

In the future, Melva would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy stocks of items like soap, candies, sugar, and milk to sell.

loans.name: Ena

texts.en:
This loan will help Ena build her daycare center.

After moving from Honduras to New York, Ena was looking for a means to begin her own business and support her daughter. In 2010, Ena opened her own daycare center in the Bronx. She now has seven children from the ages of 1 to 10 years old enrolled in her program, and she operates her daycare full-time, five days a week, with the help of a part-time employee.  

Ena is now looking to renovate her space to attract more clients and grow her business.

Ena needs a loan to purchase toys, furniture, carpet and paint to remodel her daycare center.

loans.use: To purchase toys, furniture, carpet and paint for her daycare.

loans.name: Mildred

texts.en:
As a married parent of five children, Mildred works hard to support her family.

She has a bakery business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from running a general store and raising pigs. Mildred is borrowing 24000 PHP through NWTF to purchase additional ingredients for her bakery business.

Mildred has been sustaining her business activities through her past 12 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream of saving enough money to afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional ingredients for her bakery business.

loans.name: Janet

texts.en:
Janet is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a buy-and-sell corn business in the Philippines. Janet has been in this business for 9 years. Janet earns more income from food vending and farming corn.

She is borrowing 10000 PHP through NWTF to buy additional sacks of corn for her business to sell.

Janet has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts, with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams of saving enough money so that she can afford to send her children to school in the future.

loans.use: to buy additional sacks of corn to sell.

loans.name: Analyn

texts.en:
Analyn is 34 years old and married with two children. Analyn works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a loan of 30000 PHP through NWTF to purchase items to sell like soap, canned goods, sugar, noodles, and spices.

Analyn has borrowed and paid 17 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 9 years and also earns an income from food vending.

Analyn aspires to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase items to sell like soap, canned goods, sugar, noodles, and spices.

loans.name: Mary Grace

texts.en:
Mary Grace, a 27-year-old married mother of two, has been raising pigs in the Philippines for two years to earn a living. She earns an additional income by selling charcoal.

Mary Grace is borrowing PHP 12000 through NWTF to buy feeds and vitamins for her pigs. She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy feeds and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Ailen

texts.en:
Ailen is 50 years old and married with two children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. 

Ailen has a rice retailing business in the Philippines. Ailen requested a 15000 PHP loan amount through NWTF to buy additional sacks of rice to sell.

Ailen has been in this business for 6 years. In the future, Ailen would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy additional sacks of rice to sell

loans.name: Imelda

texts.en:
Imelda works hard to support her family. Imelda is married and has a rice retailing business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for 15 years now.

Imelda requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional sacks of rice to sell.

In the future, Imelda would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional sacks of rice to sell.

loans.name: Gladis Guadalupe

texts.es: Gladis Guadalupe vive junto a sus hijas en casa propia, ella posee una tienda donde vende artículos de primera necesidad pan, frijoles, arroz, huevos, entre otros, tiene varios años con el negocio y eso le ha dado mucha experiencia en las ventas por lo que siempre obtiene las mejores ganancias, el negocio esta ubicado a su residencia en una zona muy transitado de personas y muy estratégico, se ha hecho de mucha clientela, la prefieren porque todo lo que comercia es de primera calidad, a precios accesibles y con un excelente servicio; Gladis es una mujer emprendedora con muchas ganas de salir adelante todos los días se dedica al máximo a su labor porque sabe que solo así alcanzara el éxito, como toda buena comerciante quiere extender el negocio y para ello necesita realizar una nueva inversión por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar granos básicos, golosinas, producto instantáneo, bebidas etc. Gladis Guadalupe tiene buenas referencias de pago y es muy responsable asegura que podrá saldar la deuda y a la vez confía que le podrá dar a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Gladis Guadalupe lives with her children in her own house.  She has a store where she sells basic necessities: bread, beans, rice, eggs, and others.  She has had the business for several years and it has given her a lot of experience in sales, so she always gets the best profits.

Her business is located in her house in a strategic area with a lot of people.  She has acquired a lot of customers who prefer her because everything she sells is of high quality at affordable prices, and her service is excellent.

Gladis is an enterprising woman with a great desire to get ahead.  Every day she makes the maximum effort in her work because she knows that only this way will she achieve success.  Like all good merchants she wants to expand her business, for which she needs to make a new investment.

This is why she's requesting a loan from Integral to buy basic grains, sweets, instant food products, beverages, etc.

Gladis Guadalupe has a good payment record and is very responsible.  She's certain she'll be able to repay the debt and trusts she'll be able to give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy basic grains, sweets, instant food products, and beverages

loans.name: Melanie

texts.en:
Melanie is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a general store business in the Philippines. Melanie has been in this business for 8 years and earns more income from vegetable vending and raising pigs.

She is borrowing 28000 PHP through NWTF to buy additional stock of items to sell like soap, milk, noodles, and canned goods for her general store business.

Melanie has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams of saving money to expand her business in the future.

loans.use: to buy additional stock of items to sell like soap, milk, noodles, and canned goods.

loans.name: Jen-Jen

texts.en:
Jen-Jen is 24 years old and married with one child, who is in school. Jen-Jen works very hard to provide for her family.

Jen-Jen runs a general store in the Philippines and has been in this business for 4 years. She requested a 20000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like sugar, coffee, canned goods, and soap.

In the future, Jen-Jen would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like sugar, coffee, canned goods, and soap.

loans.name: Ma. Emily

texts.en:
Ma. Emily, a 31-year-old married mother of two children, one of whom is in school, has been raising pigs for fattening in the Philippines for five years now. Having received four previous loans from NWTF to sustain her business, Ma. Emily has requested a new one for PHP 10000 to purchase feeds and additional piglets to raise.

In the future, Ma. Emily would like to repair and renovate her family home.

loans.use: to purchase feeds and additional piglets to raise.

loans.name: Susanita

texts.en:
Susanita works hard to support her family. Susanita is married and has a general store business in the Philippines. Susanita has been in this business for 15 years now.

Susanita requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF to buy more items to sell like soft drinks, noodles, eggs, spices, canned goods, etc.

In the future, Susanita would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more items to sell like soft drinks, noodles, eggs, spices, canned goods, etc.

loans.name: Fely

texts.en:
Fely is 51 years old, married and has four children. 

She raises hogs as a source of income. She has been in this business for over five years and it is a great help to her family's living situation. 

Fely wishes to care for more pigs and raise healthy and meaty hogs in order to achieve greater income. She is requesting a loan of PHP 5,000 to buy vitamins, feed and two more pigs. These would be a help in attaining good proceeds.

loans.use: to buy vitamins, feed and two more pigs.

loans.name: Odilia

texts.es: Odilia vive junto a su pequeña familia en casa propia; ella posee una venta de misceláneos, toda clase de artículos, bolsones, carteras, dulces, loncheras, bisutería entre otros, tiene varios años con el  negocio, esta ubicado en una zona que califico como excelente para su actividad comercial y se siente muy satisfecha al ver que las personas se van contentas del lugar, todo lo que vende es de primera calidad, y a precios accesibles además el servicio es excelente, Odilia es una mujer visionaria con muchas ganas de ganarse un futuro más próspero,  para ella no hay peor lucha que la que no se pelea, esta dispuesta a dar todo de su parte para siempre mantenerse delante de su competencia y además para tener la posibilidad de acrecentar el negocio para ello necesita de capital por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar  bolsones, carteras, loncheras, dulces, etc.  Odilia es muy comprometida y con un buen record crediticio tiene confianza que podrá saldar la deuda pero sobre todo tiene fe que podrá darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida como se la merecen.
texts.en:
Odilia lives with her small family in her own house.  She has a business selling all types of miscellaneous items.  She sells things like purses, wallets, sweets, lunch sacks, and costume jewelry, among others.  She has had the business for several years.  She is located in an area that is excellent for commercial activity.  She feels very pleased upon seeing that the people leave her place feeling happy.

Everything that she sells is first quality and at affordable prices.  Also, her service is excellent.  Odilia is a visionary woman with a great desire to obtain a more prosperous future.  To her there is not a worse struggle than the one that you do not fight.  She is prepared to give everything in order to always stay ahead of the competition.  She will also do so in order to have the chance to grow the business.  She needs capital to do this.

That is why she is requesting a loan from Integral.  The loan will allow her to buy purses, wallets, lunch sacks, and sweets, etc.  Odilia is very committed and has a good credit record.  She is confident that she will be able to repay the debt.  Above all, she has faith that she will be able to give her family a better quality of life like they deserve.

loans.use: to buy purses, wallets, lunch sacks, and sweets, etc.

loans.name: Loida

texts.en:
Loida is 53 years old and married with two children.

Loida works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a 30000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy additional items like canned goods, soap, soft drinks, sugar, and other items to sell. 

Loida has borrowed and paid 14 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 10 years and also earns an income as a  rice retailer and pig raiser.

Loida aspires to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy additional items like canned goods, soap, soft drinks, sugar, and other items to sell.

loans.name: Jocelyn

texts.en:
Jocelyn is 52 years old and married with three children. She works very hard to provide for them.

Jocelyn runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a 18000 PHP loan through NWTF to purchase items like soap, shampoo, milk, canned goods, and other items to sell.

Jocelyn has been in this business for 20 years.

In the future, Jocelyn would like to repair and renovate her family home.

loans.use: to purchase items like soap, shampoo, milk, canned goods, and other items to sell.

loans.name: Marynen

texts.en:
Marynen is 37 years old, married, and has four children. 

She sells a variety of goods at her small stand. Sometimes she walks door to door in order to sell easier. 

Now, Marynen wishes to increase her sales every day. She is requesting a loan of PHP 5,000 to buy more goods such as vegetables, spices, sweets and snack foods to resell. She hopes that these additional products will bring additional profits.

loans.use: to buy more goods such as vegetables, spices, sweets and snack foods.

loans.name: Chinbat

texts.en:
Chinbat, 27 years old, lives with his wife and two children in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. The family resides in a traditional Mongolian ger (portable felt dwelling) in Chinbat's brother’s yard.

From 2005 to 2010, Chinbat worked at a car wash, and in 2010 he won the organization's contest and was awarded an automobile, after which he began a taxi service for local people. He is now requesting a loan of 1500000 MNT to prepare for the upcoming Mongolian traditional holiday known as White Moon by purchasing furniture, repairing his car and covering the costs of holiday expenses. Because White Moon symbolizes the beginning of New Year, replacing old furniture and repairing his car are outward signs of a new beginning.

Chinbat is a very earnest individual who works with great sincerity. His near-future goal is to own land and build his own house.

loans.use: to cover the costs related to the White Moon holiday.

loans.name: Bishrelt

texts.en:
Mr. Bishrelt, 27 years old, lives with his mother and son in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. Since the time of his divorce, he has been living in a rental house.

Bishreit has been rendering a taxi service to local people since 2006, and has accumulated vast experience in this service field. He is now requesting a loan of 1500000 MNT to cover the cost of repainting his car and purchasing furniture.

For the incoming traditional Mongolian holiday known as White Moon, every Mongolian renews something as a symbol of a new beginning and the anticipation of favorable events in the upcoming year. As well, a fully repainted automobile will certainly increase customer satisfaction. Also, new furniture will decorate his house.

Bishreit is a very hardworking individual who cares deeply for his son and mother.

loans.use: to purchase furniture and paint his automobile.

loans.name: Marina Estela

texts.es: Marina Estela vive junto a su compañero de vida en casa propia, élla posee un pequeño taller de costura donde elabora diferentes prendas al gusto del cliente camisas, vestidos faldas entre otros además elabora mosquiteros de diferentes colores, tiene mas de seis años de experiencia en el negocio y eso le ha dado la oportunidad de obtener siempre las mejores ganancias, su negocio esta ubicado en un lugar que califico como bueno para su trabajo ya tiene mucha clientela pues las personas la prefieren porque tiene las mejores prendas,  los mejores precios, y el servicio excelente; Marina es una mujer entregada a su labor, comprometida y dispuesta a dar todo de su parte para cumplir sus objetivos propuestos, su mas grande secreto es el amor a su trabajo, sabe que así alcanzara el éxito, necesita invertir pero no posee de suficiente capital por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar tela por mayor para ropa y mosquiteros, hilos etc. Marina tiene buenas referencias de pago y se hace responsable de cancelar la deuda, esta agradecida con el apoyo y a la vez tiene la esperanza que podrá darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Marina Estela lives with her life partner in her own house.  She has a small tailor shop where she makes different garments for customers: shirts, dresses, skirts, and others.  She also makes mosquito nets in various colors.

She has more than six years of experience in the business, which has given her the opportunity to always get the best profits.  Her business is located in a place she described as good for her job because she has a lot of customers.  People prefer her because she has the best garments, the best prices, and excellent service.

Marina's a woman who is dedicated to her job, committed, and ready to give everything to achieve her goals.  Her biggest secret is her love for her job.  She knows that this way she'll achieve success.

She needs to invest but doesn't have enough capital, so she's asking Integral for a loan to buy fabric wholesale (for clothing and mosquito nets), thread, etc.

Marina has a good payment record and takes responsibility for repaying the debt.  She's grateful for the support and also hopes she'll be able to give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy fabric and thread

loans.name: Carlos Rene

texts.es: Carlos Rene vive junto a su compañera de vida y su hijo en casa propia, él se dedica a la venta de juegos de video y algunos aparatos electrónicos como nintendos, televisores y otros, tiene varios años de poseer el negocio y eso le ha regalado mucha experiencia que le permite obtener las mejores ganancias,  esta ubicado en un lugar muy estratégico que califico como excelente para sus actividades comerciales, ya tiene mucha clientela pues todas las personas lo prefieren por los buenos precios, y por la calidad del producto y el buen servicio, Carlos es un  hombre luchador, dedicado a su labor, y con muchas ganas de salir adelante día a día busca las mejores alternativas que le den la oportunidad de llegar al éxito, en estos últimos meses han aumentado los clientes y como todo buen comerciante quiere extender el negocio y realizar una nueva inversión en activos, pero para ello necesita de capital por eso le solicito a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar juegos de video, aparatos electrónicos etc.. Carlos Rene tiene buenas referencias de pago y una moral intachable, se siente muy contento con la ayuda y asegura saldar la deuda, a la vez tiene la confianza que le dará a su familia una vida plena.
texts.en:
Carlos Rene lives with his life partner and their child in his own house.  He sells video games and some electronic equipment like Nintendos, televisions, and others.  He has had this business for several years, and it has rewarded him with a lot of experience that allows him to get the best income.  

He is located in a very strategic place that qualifies as being excellent for his commercial activities.  He now has a lot of clientele.  Everyone prefers him for his good prices, the quality of the product, and the good service.

Carlos is a tenacious man who is devoted to his work.  He has a great desire to get ahead day to day.  He looks for the best options that will give him the chance to be successful.  

In these past months his customers have increased.  Like all good merchants, he wants to expand the business and make a new investment in goods.  However, he needs capital.

That is why he is requesting a loan from Integral.  The loan will allow him to buy video games and electronic equipment, etc.  

Carlos Rene has good payment references and high moral character.  He is very happy with the help, and he is sure that he will repay the debt.  He is also confident that he will give his family a full life.

loans.use: to buy video games and electronic equipment, etc.

loans.name: Fely

texts.en:
Fely is 48 years old. She raises livestock such as chickens, ducks and hogs as a source of income. She has been in this business for more than two years and she looks forward to many more years. 

Fely is pursuing her dream to secure a better lifestyle. To help her overcome poverty, she is requesting a loan of PHP 5,000 to buy feed and vitamins. This will enable her to earn additional profits soon.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins.

loans.name: Sergelenkhuu

texts.en:
Mr. Sergelenkhuu, 34 years old, lives with his wife and three children in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. The family resides in their own house on a plot of land. His wife works at a hotel as a cleaner and receptionist. His elder daughter studies at a high school. His other two children, who are 2 and 7 years old respectively, both go to kindergarten. 

Sergelenkhuu has been working as a field engineer for a private business for six years. The house the family lives in has been deteriorating over the years and needs some serious repair. In winter time, due to the house's vulnerable walls and ceilings, the family lives in very cold conditions, especially when they are short on coal. 

In order to provide his family with a comfortable and warm living environment, Sergelenkhuu has decided to renovate his house. So he is requesting a loan of 4,500,000 MNT to purchase building and insulation materials, including but not limited to fiberglass, hardwood floors, glue and wallpaper. During this time of year, the price of building materials reaches its lowest rate so it is a good time to buy these materials. 

After the repairs have been made, the family will be able to live with joy and happiness due to having a warm house. This also will enable the family to burn less coal, thereby reducing air pollution. (In Mongolia, air pollution is mainly caused by the burning of coal.) The borrower is a very hardworking individual who deeply cares about the well-being of his family and strives for a better future.

loans.use: to purchase insulation and building materials.

loans.name: Bayarsaikhan

texts.en:
Mr. Bayarsaikhan, 35 years old, lives with his wife and two children in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. The family resides in a traditional Mongolian ger (portable felt dwelling) on a plot of land.

Bayarsaikhan, who has been rendering a taxi service to local people for 11 years, has accumulated a vast amount of experience. Usually his wife drives during the day, and in the afternoon he continues the service. Because the automobile is used to provide taxi service day and night, it is very prone to damage and deterioration. Bayarsaikhan is therefore requesting a loan of 1500000 MNT to purchase spare parts.

The loan will help the couple to generate more income for their children, who are now three and four years old. With each passing day their expenses increase, thus requiring their parents to work hard. The borrower is a very hardworking individual who strives for a better future.

loans.use: to purchase spare parts.

loans.name: Leonel Antonio

texts.es: Leonel Antonio vive junto a su compañera de vida  y sus  hijos, él se dedica a la venta de tostadas de yuca, papa, y plátano, ademas para complementar sus gastos cultiva maiz es muy conocido pues tiene varios años con el negocio comercia de forma ambulante en la zona donde reside y en los diferentes alrededores de la localidad, tiene mucha clientela gracias a su amplia experiencia en las ventas, siempre obtienen las mejores ganancias, posee los mejores precios, producto de calidad y un excelente servicio; Leonel es un hombre entregado a su labor, enérgico y muy luchador siempre esta buscando las mejores alternativas que le abran camino al éxito, en las ultimas semanas aumento la demanda y como todo buen comerciante quiere aprovechar para realizar una nueva inversión que le genere mas ganancias pero para ello necesita de capital que lo respalde por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar plátanos, yuca, papa, bolsas, etc. Leonel Antonio tiene buenas referencias de pago, asegura poder saldar la deuda y a la vez tiene la confianza que le dará a su familia una vida mejor.
texts.en:
Leonel Antonio lives with her life partner and their children. He works selling toasts of manioc, potatoes and bananas, and also cultivates corn as a complement to cover expenses. After several years in business working as a street seller in his area of residence and surroundings, he's become very well known. He has many clients thanks to his broad selling experience and always obtains the best income, offers the best prices and quality, and provides an excellent service. Leonel is dedicated to his job, energetic and tenacious, and is always seeking the best ways towards success. 

Over the last few weeks he has seen an increase in demand and, as every good salesman would do, he wants to seize the opportunity to make a new investment to increase earnings. For this purpose, he needs some back-up capital, which is why he's requesting INTEGRAL a loan to buy bananas, manioc, potatoes, bags, etc. Leonel Antonio has a good payment track record and claims he'll be able to clear his debt. He's also confident he'll be able to provide his family with a better life.

loans.use: to buy bananas, manioc, potatoes and bags.

loans.name: Maria Francisca

texts.es: María Francisca vive junto a su compañero de vida y sus tres hijos en casa propia, ella se dedica a la elaboración y venta de canastos y cestas de muchos diseños que ella misma crea tiene un don inigualable que le permite cada dia mejorar en su labor, tiene varios años con el negocio y eso le ha regalado mucha experiencia en la venta que le permite obtener las mejores ganancias, su negocio esta ubicado en su vivienda y es muy conocido por las personas de la localidad donde viven,  tiene mucha clientela y la prefieren por la calidad, los buenos  precios y sobre todo por  un buen servicio; María es una mujer comprometida, dedicada a  su labor y con muchas ganas de salir adelante y cumplir sus metas,  todos los días trabaja duro para poder alcanzar el éxito y no piensa rendirse hasta lograrlo, quiere acrecentar el negocio y para ello necesita de capital que la respalde por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar hilos por mayor, cuerda, etc. María Francisca tiene buenas referencias de pago y una moral intachable se siente contenta con la colaboración, asegura que podrá saldar la deuda y  la vez tiene fe que le dará a su familia una vida plena como se la merecen.
texts.en:
María Francisca lives with her husband and three children in their own house. She makes and sells different kinds of baskets; she also creates various designs for them. María has a unique gift for this work which allows her to improve what she does with every day that passes. She’s had the business for several years so has much sales experience resulting in improved profits.

Her business is located in her house and is well-known by people in the area where she lives. She has many customers who choose to go to her because of the quality of work, the fair prices, and above all the service she provides.

María is a committed person, dedicated to her work, and with a great desire to get ahead and reach her goals. Every day she works hard to be successful and doesn’t even think of stopping until she is. 

As she wants to grow the business, María needs capital so she has asked for a loan from INTEGRAL to buy thread, cord, and other materials.  She has a good credit rating and an untarnished reputation. She is very happy to be working with INTEGRAL and is certain that she will be able to make the repayments, and at the same time give her family all that they deserve.

loans.use: buy thread, cord, and other materials

loans.name: Sengesamba

texts.en:
Mr. Sengesamba is 46 years old and lives with his wife and two children in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. The family resides in a traditional Mongolian ger (portable felt dwelling) on his sister’s plot of land. His wife works as a fuel dispenser at a petroleum-importing company. His two children both go to secondary school. 

Sengesamba has been operating a carpenter’s workshop since 2012. Now the business has stabilized and he has even hired two people on a full-time basis. Before this business, he purchased and sold coal at wholesale prices to local people. Also, during the summer time, he renders transportation of goods and services at an outdoor market. 

He is requesting a loan of 1,700,000 MNT to purchase tools and equipment such as an air compressor, generator, circular saw and extension cords. As a result, he will be able to generate more income for his family as well as produce high-quality products, thus increasing consumer satisfaction.

loans.use: to purchase tools and equipment such as an air compressor, generator, circular saw and extension cords.

loans.name: Bekhbayar

texts.en:
Mr. Bekhbayar, 37 years old, lives with his wife and 1-year-old son in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. His wife has a position as an accountant at a bakery and also stays at home to care for her son. 

Bekhbayar has been rendering transportation services since 2008. Before this business, he worked in Korea as a contract worker. He is requesting a loan of 3,500,000 MNT to purchase a sofa and wardrobe as well as repair his automobile's brakes. As a result, his family will be able to live in a comfortable place and he will be able to work enthusiastically due to his new braking system. 

The borrower is a very hardworking individual who cares deeply for his wife and son.

loans.use: to purchase a sofa and wardrobe as well as repair his automobile's brakes.

loans.name: Mario Filadelfo

texts.es: Mario Filadelfo vive junto a su compañera de vida Blanca y sus dos hijos en casa propia; él posee un comedor  donde vende ricos platillos sopas, carnes, ensaladas, bebidas entre otros, tiene varios años con el negocio y se ha hecho de mucha experiencia en la venta lo que le permite obtener las mejores ganancias, comercia en un lugar que califico como excelente para sus actividades  ya tiene mucha clientela y las personas lo prefieren porque todo lo que comercia es de calidad, a precios accesibles y con un servicio inigualable siempre a la orden del cliente; Mario es un hombre emprendedor, dedicado a su labor, y todo un soñador, todos los días lucha por cumplir cada una de sus metas y se esforzara al máximo hasta lograr ese éxito, en las ultimas semanas aumento la demanda pues las comidas con exquisitas y como todo buen comerciante desea aprovechar para acrecentar el negocio, pero necesita de capital que lo respalde porque sus compras son al contado por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita carnes, verduras, granos basicos, bebidas, etc. Mario Filadelfo tiene buenas referencias de pago y es muy responsable, asegura que podrá saldar la deuda y a la vez tiene la esperanza en que le dará a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Mario Filadelfo lives with his wife Blanca and their two children in their own home. He owns a restaurant where he sells delicious soups, meat dishes, salads, drinks etc. He’s had the restaurant for several years so has much sales experience resulting in improved profits. It’s located in an excellent spot so he has many customers who choose to eat there because of the quality food, fair prices, and exemplary service.

Mario is a hardworking man, dedicated to his work, and with a vision of the future. Every day he works hard to reach one of his goals and doesn’t stop until he has. These last weeks have seen an increased demand for his wonderful food so, like all good businessmen, he wishes to take advantage of the situation and grow his business. As he has to buy everything with cash, he has approached INTEGRAL for a loan to buy meat, vegetables, basic grains, drinks etc. He has a good credit rating and is a responsible person.  He is certain that he will be able to make the repayments, and at the same time give his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: buy meat, vegetables, basic grains, drinks etc.

loans.name: Otgonbayar

texts.en:
Mrs. Otgonbayar, who is 24 years old, lives with her sister in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. Just after graduating from a university, she began working as a nurse at a health center for mothers and their children. Becoming a fine doctor is her childhood dream, and she is still pursuing her dream to this day. 

Otgonbayar has two brothers, both of whom run their own businesses. She is requesting a loan of 3,000,000 MNT to purchase furniture such as a sofa, wardrobe, etc. For the upcoming Mongolian traditional holiday known as White Moon, she wants to decorate her home with new furniture as a symbol of welcoming the new year with new beginnings.  

The borrower is a very hardworking and honest individual who strives to live a better life.

loans.use: to purchase furniture such as a sofa, wardrobe, etc.

loans.name: Ezekiel

texts.en:
Ezekiel is a 43-year-old mechanic, taxi driver and transporter of light goods in Mishomuhoroni, Mombasa. He is married and has been doing well in this business for the last fifteen years.

This marks Ezekiel's second loan from KADET LTD and he will use it to purchase spare parts for his taxi. He plans to plow the anticipated profit back into the business. He serviced the previous loan successfully. 

He hopes to own more taxis in the future.

loans.use: to purchase spare parts for his taxi

loans.name: Gerber Antonio

texts.es: Gerber de 59 años de edad, Es un hombre muy alegre, con la vida que Dios le ha dado y la oportunidades de tener una feliz familia conformada por su esposa y sus hijos, que son su mayor fuente de inspiración a realizar lo mejor de sí y darlo sin medida confiando en que a su familia jamás le ha faltado nada. Es muy responsable y dedicado en sus labores él se dedica a cultivar granos básicos siendo estos maíz y sorgo, con entusiasmo realiza esta actividad y lo hace con el mayor esfuerzo para que en su hogar siempre exista el alimento diario. Gerber desea invertir más en la compra de insumos agrícolas como: Abono, Herbicida, fertilizantes, entre otros. Agradece desde ya todas las bendiciones que Dios le ha dado y confía plenamente que exista la esperanza de que su condición de vida mejore en gran medida.
texts.en:
Gerber, 59, is pleased with the life God gave him and the chance to have a happy family, which comprises his wife and children. They are his source of inspiration to do his best and to make sure they never lack what they need. He is very responsible and dedicated to his work.

Gerber eagerly and energetically grows basic grain crops, corn and soya, so that his family always has food on the table. He wants to buy more agricultural supplies such as manure, weed killer, and fertilizer. He thanks God for his blessings and is confident in his expectations to significantly improve his standard of living.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies such as manure, weed killer, and fertilizer.

loans.name: Mbenyu

texts.en:
Mbenyu is a 31-year-old married mother of four who lives in Samburu, Kenya. She is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a charcoal store business at her rural home. Her major monthly expenses are her children's school fees.

Mbenyu is seeking a loan amounting to 50,000 Kenyan shillings (KES) to buy more sacks of charcoal. She is grateful for this opportunity.

loans.use: to buy sacks of charcoal.

loans.name: Rosa Margarita

texts.es: Rosa Margarita vive junto a sus  hijos en casa propia, ella se dedica a la confección y venta de carteras en variedad y con diferentes estilos únicos al gusto del cliente, tiene varios años con el negocio y eso le ha regalado mucha experiencia que le permite obtener las mejores ganancias, el negocio esta ubicado en su vivienda y es muy conocido por las personas del lugar, se ha hecho de mucha clientela pues las personas saben que todo es de calidad, a precios accesibles y con un servicio inigualable siempre a la orden y al gusto de los clientes; Rosa es una mujer activa y decidida, muy dedicada a su labor y muy luchadora día con día se esfuerza al máximo para ganarse una vida mejor y un gran éxito para el futuro, en las ultimas semanas aumento la demanda y quiere aprovechar para una nueva inversión, pero no posee de suficiente capital que la respalde por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar tela por mayor, hilos, cierres etc. Rosa Margarita tiene buenas referencias de pago y una moral intachable, asegura que podrá saldar la deuda y a la vez tiene la esperanza que llevara a su hogar seguridad económica.
texts.en:
Rosa Margarita lives with her children in her own house.  She earns a living making and selling a variety of purses in different unique styles, according to the customers' tastes.

She has had the business for several years, which has given her a lot of experience that allows her to get the best profits.  The business is located in her home and she's well known among the people in the area.  She has acquired a lot of customers because people know that everything is high quality at affordable prices with incomparable service.  She's always ready to serve her customers.

Rosa's an active and determined woman who is devoted to her job and strives a lot.  Every day she makes the maximum effort to get a better life and a successful future for herself.

Demand has grown in the past few weeks and she wants to take advantage of it with a new investment.  She doesn't have sufficient capital to support the investment, though, so she's asking Integral for a loan to buy fabric wholesale, thread, zippers, etc.

Rosa Margarita has a good payment record and an impeccable character.  She's certain she'll be able to repay the debt and also hopes she'll bring economic security to her household.

loans.use: to buy fabric, thread, and zippers

loans.name: Jamilton Olindo

texts.es: Jamilton de 25 años de edad habita junto a su esposa y sus hijos en casa propia. Gracias a Dios es un hombre muy emprendedor, decidido a ser un gran padre y esposo. Siempre con deseos de superación ha trabajado para que en su hogar jamás haga falta el pan de cada día, siendo así esa persona responsable por su familia que le importa tener las mejores beneficios para los suyos. Jamilto cosecha maíz ,frijol y sorgo esa es su fuente de ingresos y se siente orgulloso pues en su hogar es el único que trabaja y le brida lo mejor a su familia con sus dos manos y el sudor de su frente cada día. El desea cosecha más pues necesita mayores ingresos es por eso que solicita a INTEGRAL un préstamo para la compra de insumos agrícolas como semillas, abonos, fertilizantes y pesticidas ya que confía mucho en sus capacidades y que todo le ira bien con este préstamo. Espera seguir siendo ese hombre ejemplar y su familia se siga sintiendo orgullosa de el.
texts.en:
Jamilton, 25, lives with his wife and children in their own house. He is enterprising, and thanks to God, determined to be a good father and husband. He has always wanted to be successful and responsible. He works hard to earn the most income he can to provide for his family's needs.  

Jamilto grows corn, beans, and sorghum to earn a living and is proud to be the breadwinner in his family. He offers his family the best with his labor and the sweat of his brow. He wants to increase his harvest because he needs more income. He is applying to INTEGRAL for a loan to buy agricultural supplies such as seed, manure, fertilizer, and pesticide. He is confident in his skills and in the outcome of the investment. He expects to continue to be a model family man that his family is proud of.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies such as seed, manure, fertilizer, and pesticide.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to cover the cost of opening a new hardware store.

loans.name: Chizi

texts.en: Chizi is 29 years old, married and the mother of two children. She lives with her family in Samburu, Kenya in a solar-powered home which they build on their own. Chizi earns a living by selling water. She has been in this line of work for four years and is requesting a loan for KSH. 50,000 to buy a water tank, because this will allow her to do a better job of meeting her customer's needs.

loans.use: to buy a water-storage tank.

loans.name: Henry Alberto

texts.es: Henry de 39 años de edad, habita junto a su familia, su esposa y sus hijos. En la zona donde reside es  muy conocido por ser trabajador, honesto, emprendedor puesto que siempre ha realizado más mejores labores en su hogar, siendo el responsable del llevar el sustento diario a su hogar y lo hace con lo único que sabe hacer cultiva maíz y sorgo, Cada mañana se levanta con las mejores ilusiones de realizar esta actividad deseando la bendición de Dios en su trabajo, desea comprar insumos agrícolas para en estas cosechas tener los mejores productos es por eso que solicita a INTEGRAL un préstamo para la compra de : semillas, abonos, fertilizantes y pesticidas. Teniendo en cuanta que se compromete en saldar la cuenta antes de lo previsto ya que jamás le ha gustado quedarle mal a nadie y posee excelentes referencias de pago. A el lo único que le interesa es que su familia vea el esfuerzo que cada día el realiza y que a ellos nunca les falte nada.
texts.en: Henry, 39, lives with his wife and children.  His neighbors say that he is honest, hard-working and enterprising.  He is responsible for supporting his family and does so in the best way he knows how: maize and sorghum farming.  He gets up every morning praying that, with God's help, he can carry out everything that he has to do to maintain the farm.  He is applying for an INTEGRAL loan that he will use to buy the supplies he needs for his business: seeds, manure, fertilizer and pesticides.  He hopes to repay the loan ahead of schedule and has excellent references.  The most important things for him are working hard for his family and making sure that they have everything they need.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizer, etc. for his farming business.

loans.name: Mchicha Group

texts.en:
Mariam, who is in her mid 30s, is married, with five children and one orphan. One of her children is still in school and the orphan also goes to school. 

Mariam has been running two businesses, selling charcoal and fabrics, which she sells door-to-door. She works from 9.00 AM to 6.30 PM daily and is able to make a good monthly profit. 

This will Mariam's first loan from Tujijenge Tanzania which she wants to use for buying more sacks of charcoal. Mariam's dream is to one day be able to expand her business. 

Mariam will share this loan with her loan group, "Mchicha Group," with 12 members who will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to buy more sacks of charcoal.

loans.name: Joseph

texts.en: Joseph is 35 years old, married and the father of three children. He and his family live in Samburu, Kenya in an electric-powered house which also has tap water. His main monthly expense is school fees for his children. He earns a living by raising and selling poultry and is requesting a loan for KSH. 25,000 to buy more livestock. He wishes to express his gratitude for the support he receives from Kiva lenders.

loans.use: to buy more poultry to raise and sell.

loans.name: Peninah

texts.en: Peninah is 48 years old, married and helps support a family of six people. She earns a living by running a retail shop where she has earned an income of KES. 48,000 a month for the last eight years. She has successfully taken out and repaid six previous loans from KADET LTD and is requesting a new loan, for KES. 100,000, to buy more items to sell to her customers, including sugar, salt, crates of soft drinks and maize flour. She plans to use the additional income she will earn to pay school fees for her children and expand her business. Her goals for the future are to improve her family's living standards, be financially stable and pay school fees and expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more items to sell to her customers.

loans.name: Gustavo Adolfo

texts.es: Gustavo de 41 años de edad, vive junto a su familia su esposa y sus hijos en casa propia. Con diversas actividades y responsabilidades sus vecinos lo caracterizan por ser muy emprendedor ya que con deseos de superación ha logrado que su familia se mantenga siempre con el alimento diario. Se dedica a la agricultura de granos básicos siendo este maíz y frijol y también cereales. Gracias Dios siempre ha tenido los mejores cultivos de la zona  pero el desea comprar insumos agrícolas antes que se acerquen las próximas cosechas es por eso que solicita  INTEGRAL un préstamo para la compra de insumos agrícolas como: semillas, abono, fertilizantes, pesticidas entre otros. Espera contar con la ayuda solicitada y así su familia seguirá teniendo una buena y estable condición de vida.
texts.en: Gustavo, 41, owns a house where he lives with his wife and children.  His neighbors say that he is very enterprising and point to his many sources of income.  He works hard to get ahead because his family depends on him.  Gustavo has a farming business.  He plants maize, beans and cereals and harvests the best crops in the area.  He is applying for an INTEGRAL loan that he will use to buy supplies for his business: seeds, manure, fertilizer, pesticides, etc.  He is counting on the loan to provide the help he needs to ensure a good and stable life for his family.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertlizer, etc. for his farming business.

loans.name: Maria Magdalena

texts.es: María de 18 años de edad habita junto a su esposo y su hijo en casa propia es una mujer muy trabajadora, toda su vida se ha dedicado hacer una mujer ejemplar para su familia, muy responsable con sus qué haceres del hogar y de la mano de su esposo ayudan para que nunca les falte el pan de cada día. María se dedica a la labor de ser agricultora de granos básicos como maíz, frijol y además cultiva loroco y jocote. Siempre cada mañana se levanta con nuevos deseos de superación y emprende su día de labores cosechando y luego recolectando para vender cierta parte y otra dejarla para consumos propio. Ella desea comprar insumos agrícolas para estas nuevas cosechas próximas es por eso que solicita a INTEGRAL un préstamo para comprar: semillas, abonos, fertilizantes, pesticidas u otros. Así ella podrá seguir brindando una buena calidad de vida a su familia.
texts.en: Maria, 18, owns a house where she lives with her husband and son.  She has worked hard to be a model homemaker, supporting her husband and taking care of her family, ensuring that they never go without their daily bread.  Maria has a farming business.  She grows basic grains: maize and beans, along with loroco and jocote.  She gets up every morning, urged on by the desire to get ahead, and spends her day taking care of her crop.  She harvests part of the crop for sale and part of it for her own use.  Maria is applying for an INTEGRAL loan that she will use to buy supplies for her business: seeds, manure, fertilizer, pesticides, etc.  The investment will allow her to provide her family with a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizer, etc. for her farming business.

loans.name: Dora Alicia

texts.es: Dora de 38 años de edad habita junto a su esposo y sus hijos en casa propia es una mujer muy trabajadora, toda su vida se ha dedicado hacer una mujer ejemplar para su familia, muy responsable con sus que haceres del hogar y de la mano de su esposo ayudan para que nunca les falte el pan de cada día. Dora se dedica a la venta de medicinas las mas principales como acetaminofen, dolofin, ibuprofeno entre otros y ademas  a la labor de ser agricultora de granos básicos como maíz, frijol y sorgo, Siempre cada mañana se levanta con nuevos deseos de superación y emprende su día de labores cosechando y luego recolectando para vender cierta parte y otra dejarla para consumos propio. Ella desea comprar insumos agrícolas para estas nuevas cosechas próximas es por eso que solicita a INTEGRAL un préstamo para comprar: semillas, abonos, fertilizantes, pesticidas u otros. Así ella podrá seguir brindando una buena calidad de vida a su familia.
texts.en:
Dora, 38, lives with her husband and children in their own house. She has worked hard and is determined to be a good example for her family. She does the household chores, and she and her husband make sure the family is provided for.  

Dora sells medicines, primarily acetaminophen, dolofin, and ibuprofen, and also grows basic grain crops such as corn, beans, and sorghum. She gets up every day with the desire to get ahead. She does her farm chores first. She sells part of the harvest and keeps the rest to feed her family. She wants to buy supplies for the upcoming harvest and is applying to INTEGRAL for a loan to buy seed, manure, fertilizer, and pesticide. This will help her to offer a good life to her family.

loans.use: to buy seed, manure, fertilizer, and pesticide.

loans.name: Justine

texts.en: Justine is 27 years old, married and the mother of three children. In 2003, she went into business by running a small beauty salon. She requested a loan, which she has since paid back, to more her business to a better and more strategic location. The move was a success and she is now requesting a new loan, for UGX. 1,500,000, to buy more cosmetics and equipment and to pay her rent. She supplements the income she earns from her beauty salon by singing songs and has already released several singles. Her goal for the future is to own a home where she can also operate her business so that she does not need to pay rent. She hopes to achieve her dreams for the future by making good use of loans like this one.

loans.use: to buy supplies and cosmetics for a beauty salon.

loans.name: Kisarawe One Group

texts.en:
Juliana, who is in her 40s, is a widow and a mother of four children. One of the children goes to school and the rest have completed their study. 

Since 2002, Juliana is managing her family costs by owning a hotel and doing catering activities. She works from 6am to 4pm, but sometimes until midnight, if she has a function in her hotel. She is able to make a very good profit per month. 

This loan request is Juliana's ninth loan from Kiva's field partner, Tujijenge Tanzania. Juliana's previous loans, all of which she successfully paid back, allowed her to increase her stocks of food items and buy catering server dishes and more plates. With the profit, she paid for household expenses, like food, paid her child's school fees, and built a house. 

Juliana will use this loan to buy a deep freezer for business activities. Her dream is to one day be able to buy a car.  

She will share this loan with her loan group, "Kisarawe One Group," which totals 17 members. The members of the group will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to buy a deep freezer for her business.

loans.name: Andres

texts.es: Andres de 41 años de edad vive junto a su esposa y sus hijos, en casa propia. Gracias a Dios es un hombre que toda su vida ha sido trabajador y ha sido un buen padre ejemplar para sus vecinos y a su vez siendo un gran ejemplo para sus hijos. Andres es responsable, atento, humilde pero con buenos deseos de superación su profesión es Agricultor siendo esta una actividad económica que consiste en la cosecha de granos basicos como son maiz y frijol y tabien tiene una tomatera.  Es así como día a día se gana la vida honradamente y nunca ha faltado el  pan en su hogar el desea comprar insumos agricolas como son semillas, abonos, fertilizantes entre otros. Es por eso que solicita este credito a  INTEGRAL el lo unico que  quiere seguirle brindando mejores condiciones de vida a su familia
texts.en:
Andres, age 41, lives with his wife and children in his own house.  Thanks to God, he has been a hard-working man all of his life.  He has been setting a good example of being a father for his neighbors and a good example for his children.

Andres is responsible, attentive, and humble.  He has a great desire for self-improvement in his profession, which is farming.  His business activity consists of harvesting basic grains like corn and beans.  He also has a tomato crop.  This is how he honorably earns a living day to day.  He has always provided his household with their daily bread.

He wishes to buy agricultural supplies like seeds, manure, and fertilizer, among others.  That is why he is requesting this loan from Integral.  The only thing that he wants is to continue giving his family better living conditions.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies like seeds, manure, and fertilizer, among others.

loans.name: Mario Enrique

texts.es: Mario de 54 años de edad habita junto a su esposa y sus hijos. Es un hombre muy entregado al trabajo y a sus responsabilidades en el hogar ya que todas las personas lo conocen por ser muy responsable, honesto y sincero. Mario se dedica al cultivo de granos básicos maíz y frijol, y toda la vida ha realizado esta actividad y es su única fuente de ingreso, gracias a Dios le va bien ya que sabe cómo manejar sus productos, El desea comprar antes de la cosecha todo los insumos necesarios y es por eso que solicita a INTEGRAL un préstamo para la compra de semillas, abonos, fertilizantes, pesticidas entre otros, ya que cuenta con buenas excelencias de pago, esta seguro que las bendiciones se le darán y el seguirá dándole una buena condición de vida para su familia.
texts.en:
Mario is fifty-four years old and lives with his wife and children.  He is a man who is very committed to his work and to his home responsibilities; everyone knows him for being a very responsible, honest, and sincere person.  

Mario makes a living in the cultivation of basic grains, like corn and beans.  He has been doing this for his whole life, and this is his only means of income.  Thanks to God, everything is going well since he already knows how to manage his products.  

He hopes to buy all the necessary supplies before the harvest, and it is for this reason that he is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL.  He will buy seeds, manure, fertilizer, pesticide, and other items.  

Since he has good means of payment, he is sure that blessings will come to him and that he will be able to continue giving his family a good way of life.

loans.use: to buy seeds, manure, fertilizer, pesticide, and other items.

loans.name: Jose Misael

texts.es: Jose de 29 años de edad habita junto a su esposa y sus hijos en casa propia. Es un hombre con diversas capacidades y cualidades que los vecinos, siempre con la disposición de ayudar a quien lo necesita Jose  es muy amable, con los que lo buscan, responsable con sus actividades y méritos diarios. Actualmente se dedica a la labor de ser agricultor, es decir cultiva Granos basicos como maiz y frijol y ademas con esfuerzo poseen una pequeña tienda que es admeinistrada por su esposa. Gracias a su manera de ser posee de clientes quienes lo buscan por precios accesibles y en esta ocasión necesita que INTEGRAL le brinde un préstamo para la compra de insumos agrícolas, y a la preparacion del terreno ya que los que tenia se le terminaron y para esta próxima cosecha necesita comprar: semillas, abonos, fertilizantes, pesticidas entre otros. Espera contar con la ayuda puesto que no tiene otros recursos para seguir alimentando a su familia
texts.en:
29-year old Jose lives with his wife and children in his own home. He is a man with a variety of skills and qualities who is always ready to help his neighbours. He is very friendly to those whom he helps, and responsible in his work and daily activities. 

Currently Jose is working as a farmer growing basic grains such as corn and beans. As well he has a small store which his wife runs. Because of the type of person he is, he has customers who seek him out for his fair prices. Now he needs a loan from INTEGRAL to buy agricultural supplies for his land. He has finished those he had so in time for the next season, he needs to buy: seeds, manure, fertilizer, pesticide etc. 

Jose hopes to obtain this loan as he has no other way of feeding his family.

loans.use: buy seeds, manure, fertilizer, pesticide etc. for his land

loans.name: Vilma Antonia

texts.es: Vilma de 55 años de edad habita juntos a su esposo y sus hijos, muy conocida por sus vecinos como una mujer trabajadora, emprendedora, capaz de realizar todo aquello que se ponga en mente. Ella se dedica al  cultivo de granos basicos  maiz y frijoles, maíz.  así como ella comercializa todo lo que Dios le provee. Vilma desea en estas próximas cosechas tener más ganancias pues ya que no cuenta con otros ingresos desea tener lo necesario para que en su hogar nunca falte el pan de cada día. Es pos eso que solicita a INTEGRAL un préstamo para comprar insumos agrícolas como: fertilizantes, pesticidas, herbicidas, semillas y abonos. Espera contar con la ayuda y de ante mano agradece a Dios por darle esta oportunidad de superación de vida.
texts.en:
Vilma, 55, lives with her husband and children. The neighbors say she is hardworking, enterprising, and able to accomplish whatever she sets her mind to. Vilma grows basic crops such as corn and beans and is able to sell everything she produces.

Vilma hopes to earn more with the next harvests, since they are her only income source and she wants to make sure her family is provided for. She is applying to INTEGRAL for a loan to buy agricultural supplies such as fertilizer, pesticide, weed killer, seed, and manure. She is counting on this help and thanks God for the chance to get ahead in life.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies such as fertilizer, pesticide, weed killer, seed, and manure.

loans.name: Astenia Noemy

texts.es: Astenia de 33 años de edad, vive junto a su grupo familiar. Reside en casa propia gracias a Dios, siempre con el deseo de superación se caracteriza por ser emprendedora con sus que haceres domésticos y a la vez ayudarle a su esposo en su trabajo.
